Description: [Key:LLSPRINT_Mod_Description:Toggle Sprint increases the default running speed in a way that's customizable. Variable sprinting speeds can be set, sprinting can be toggled off, and more.]

Entries.Text: See the full changelog in the 'Change Notes' tab on the Steam Workshop page.

Changes: Update Extender and LeaderLib API usage.
Added string keys for the Toggle Sprint skill.
Fixed settings not displaying in the LeaderLib Mod Settings menu, in the main menu.
Made all settings translatable in the LeaderLib Mod Settings menu.
